articles.content: A new image purporting to show a new premium Android smartphone with an extra-large camera hump protruding from one corner of the rear panel: a description that could easily apply to the upcoming Xia… [+1367 chars]

articles.title: Why you should be using neurocosmetics - India Today
articles.description: An innovative intersection of science and beauty, neurocosmetics is a modern approach to skincare to enhance skin and emotional well-being
articles.content: Picture this: you buy a coffee body scrub powder and immediately after using it, could sense positive emotions engulf you. Wondering, you read the label and happen to read a term-neurocosmetics. An e… [+3816 chars]
